artist: Delineator: Sébastien Le Clerc; Painter: After Charles Le Brun
description: the Battle of Arbella (or Gaugameta); Alexander the Great at center with an eagle flying above his head; Darius on chariot at right; in lower margin is Colbert's coat of arms
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ LA VERTU EST DIGNE DE L\'EMPIRE DU MONDE; DEGNA ORBIS EMPERIO VIRTUS/(description in both Latin and French below title)]; in pencil in plate: [S. le Clerc 1-280]
title: La Vertu est digne de l'empire du monde; Degna orbis imperio virtus
